attributes.action: Make it a free choice to be vaccinated against Covid-19!
attributes.additional_details:
I believe it is concerning that we are being forced and bullied in to having a vaccination, and now are being told we will have a limited social life if we don’t have the vaccine. 

This is a basic human right that cannot be controlled.
attributes.background:
To make it a free choice to be vaccinated against Covid-19, and don’t stop people from going to nightclubs, holidays, shops just because they are not vaccinated. 

To have no restrictions on this matter and leave it to a free choice of the individual.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
